name: Cards Over LAN
author: Nicholas Fleck, Matthew Farstad, Jessica Fleck

desc.en: Combine all three bean cards into the ultimate play, and emerge victorious.
desc.de: Alle drei Bohnenkarten zur ultimativen Antwort kombinieren und die Runde gewinnen.

content.en: A plastic bag full of wriggling thumbs.
Thomas the Tank Engine.
Patrick Stewart's silky-smooth head.
"Lettuce".
Lightning McQueen.
Jazz hands.
Threatening letters from the IRS.
Cheating at the pillow fight by filling yours with bricks.
content.de: Bei der Kissenschlacht betrügen, indem du dein Kissen mit Ziegeln füllst.

content.en: A horde of hungry cockroaches.
Morning breath.
Mario without a mustache.
A 2-liter bottle of dead flies.
The thrill of the hunt.
The Pillsbury Doughboy with realistic human eyes.
content.de: Der Pillsbury Doughboy mit realistischen menschlichen Augen.

content.en: Ed Sheeran's gazing, disembodied face.
The weird side of YouTube.
Ominous music.
Enhanced interrogation techniques.
A limp handshake.
The gang's newest mystery.
An ancient underground civilization.
An incredible amount of maggots.
Trickle-down economics.
Buzz Lightyear to the rescue!
My long-lost brother.
The Grinch.
Wearing sunglasses at night.
A toilet plunger with an uncomfortably short handle.
content.de: Eine Saugglocke mit einem unbequem kurzen Griff.

content.en: A smoke alarm that refuses to turn off.
content.de: Ein Rauchmelder, der nicht abgeschaltet werden kann.

content.en: Will Smith.
Thanos' snap.
An alternate universe.
Grandma's famous casserole.
Chernobyl.
A steaming pile of spaghetti.
BILLY MAYS HERE WITH AN AMAZING NEW PRODUCT!
content.de: BILLY MAYS, HIER MIT EINEM FANTASTISCHEN NEUEN PRODUKT!

content.en: A handsome young man with a lovely smile.
content.de: Ein gut aussehender junger Mann mit einem schönen Lächeln.

content.en: Having teeth for fingernails.
Cold gravy.
Replacing all the shampoo with hair remover.
content.de: All den Shampoo durch Haarentfernungsmittel ersetzen.

content.en: The smell of burning hair.
Death and taxes.
EXCLUSIVE bonus footage!
Pride and accomplishment.
A perfectly symmetrical man who speaks only in palindromes.
A slap so hard it shakes the ground.
Defaulting on student loans.
Actually being smarter than a fifth grader.
A pug with human teeth.
Canned laughter.
The Infinity Gauntlet.
An obnoxious, cringey car dealership mascot.
Extra-chunky peanut butter.
A blinding beam of light accompanied by heavenly music.
Dr. Pepper's lesser-known brother, Dr. Salt.
content.de: Der weniger bekannte Bruder von Dr. Pepper, Dr. Salt.

content.en: Dabbing in outer space.
Waldo.
That talking dog from the baked beans commercials.
content.de: Der sprechende Hund aus den Baked-Beans-Werbesendungen.

content.en: The metric system.
Turning it off and on again.
Not much to speak of.
My younger, dumber self.
A victorious fistbump.
Scuttling away sideways like a crab.
Multi-level marketing.
Breaking the silence with an ear-splitting, soul-shattering scream.
content.de: Die Stille mit einem ohrenbetäubenden, weltbewegenden Schrei brechen.

content.en: A little pizzazz.
Copyrighted dance moves.
Being entitled to significant financial compensation.
The X-Files theme song, out of nowhere.
Arguing over whether Sonic the Hedgehog has one eye or two.
content.de: Streiten darüber, ob Sonic der Igel ein oder zwei Augen hat.

content.en: Cackling evilly and bursting into a cloud of bats.
content.de: Gackern und in eine Wolke von Fledermäusen platzen.

content.en: Mister Rogers.
Upholding the family's honor.
Horse.
Attitude.
A TED Talk that's just 15 minutes of nonstop screaming.
content.de: Ein TED Talk, das nur 15 Minuten ununterbrochenes Schreien ist.

content.en: Being forced to watch The Emoji Movie.
The Card Czar.
Long, dirty fingernails.
Shrek.
Hickory flavor.
Gamers.
A lot, and I mean a lot of moths.
Sleek, luxurious hair.
Hamburger Helper.
Feeling blessed.
Being such a good boy.
Num-nums for my tum-tum!
The guy right behind you.
A frothing horde of angry pig-men.
Uninstalling McAfee AntiVirus.
Doing it for the Gram.
You're not you when you're hungry. Have ________.
When you really think about it, ________ isn't too different from ________.
Yes! I did it! I've invented a machine that converts ________ to ________. I'm gonna be rich!
Our forests are disappearing at a shocking rate, all due to the high global demand for ________.
These days, you can't walk ten feet outside without seeing ________, and it makes me sick.
Damn it, son! Didn't we talk about not bringing ________ in the house?!
Gentlemen… Behold! My latest glorious creation, "________"!
Nothing says ________ like ________.

Today's forecast:
Partly cloudy, a mild 70°, with a slight chance of _________ in the evening.
If there's anything to be learned from ________, it's that ________ is never a good idea.

Alcohol? Pffft!
Those of us here in the civilized world only drink ________.
I worry about a lot of things, but ________ isn't one of them.
content.de: Ich mache mir über viele Dinge Sorgen, aber ________ ist keines davon.

content.en: I lost 30 pounds in 30 days, all thanks to ________!
content.de: Ich habe in 30 Tagen 30 Pfund abgenommen, und das alles dank ________!

content.en: Never underestimate a man with _________.
content.de: Man sollte nie einen Mann mit _________ unterschätzen.

content.en: My dream last night was nuts! I was trapped in ________, had to fight off ________, then suddenly I was killed by ________!
content.de: Mein letzter Traum war verrückt! Ich wurde in ________ gefangen, musste ________ abwehren, und dann wurde plötzlich von ________ getötet!

content.en:
The fools!
They told me it couldn't be done.
They told me I couldn't combine ________ with ________.
Now I'll prove them all wrong!
Happiness is ________.

__________.
It never gets old!
What's the hottest new trend everyone's talking about?
content.de: Was ist der heißeste neue Trend?

content.en: _______ hurts a lot more than I expected it to.
content.de: ________ tut viel mehr weh, als ich dachte.

content.en: The future is meaningless, but ________ is now.
content.de: Die Zukunft ist bedeutungslos, aber jetzt gibt es ________.

content.en: Modern technology has finally made ________ possible, but it comes with the unfortunate tradeoff of ________.
content.de: Moderne Technologie ermöglicht endlich ________, aber es gibt einen unangenehmen Kompromiss: ________.

content.en: What's the latest craze in the conspiracy community?
content.de: Was ist der letzte Schrei in der Verschwörungsgemeinschaft?

content.en: I don't care what anyone else thinks! Anybody who's ________ deserves ________!
content.de: Mir ist egal, was die anderen darüber denken! Jeder, der ________ ist, verdient ________!

content.en: I was a difficult child; I absolutely wouldn't fall asleep without ________.
content.de: Ich war ein schwieriges Kind; ich würde ohne _________ absolut nicht einschlafen.

content.en:
Every night, I pray for ________.
And every morning, I'm sorely disappointed.
content.de:
Jeden Abend bete ich für ________.
Und jeden Morgen bin ich sehr enttäuscht.

content.en: What's the real reason aliens haven't contacted us?
content.de: Was ist der wahre Grund dafür, dass Außerirdische uns nicht kontaktiert haben?

content.en: Nobody ever thought they'd see me ______. Well, today's the day I make it happen!
content.de: Niemand hätte je gedacht, dass sie mich ______ sehen würden. Nun, heute ist der Tag, an dem ich es möglich mache!

content.en: Why was I permanently banned from Walmart?
content.de: Warum wurde ich dauerhaft von Walmart ausgeschlossen?

content.en: Police are now handing out tickets to people for _______ while driving.
content.de: Die Polizei verteilt jetzt Strafzettel wegen _______ am Steuer.

content.en: 9 out of 10 doctors now agree that a daily dose of _______ may reduce the risk of heart disease.
In my mind, anyone who's _______ is a hero.
content.de: Meiner Meinung nach ist jeder, der ________ ist, ist ein Held.

content.en: For just one easy payment of $19.95, you too can be a proud owner of _______!
content.de: Für nur eine einfache Zahlung von $19,95 können auch Sie ein stolzer Besitzer von _______ sein!

content.en: Mommy, mommy! I just saw daddy and he was _______!
content.de: Mama, mama! Ich habe gerade Papa beim ________ gesehen!

content.en: To meet new Department of Education requirements, US high schools now require freshmen to take a course on _______.
content.de: Um die neuen Anforderungen des Bildungsministeriums zu erfüllen, müssen Studienanfänger in den USA nun einen Kurs am _______ belegen.

content.en: Nothing's better than the smell of _______ in the morning.
content.de: Nichts ist besser als der Geruch von _______ am Morgen.

content.en: Nothing warms my heart quite like seeing someone _______.
content.de: Nichts ist herzerwärmender, als jemanden ________ zu sehen.

content.en: When Christmas morning came, the kids ran excitedly to their stockings, only to find them filled with ________.
Despite what my friends might tell you, I have never liked ______.
content.de: Egal was dir meine Freunde vielleicht sagen, habe ich nie _______ genossen.

content.en: ________: A delicious part of a complete breakfast.
content.de: ________: Ein leckeres Teil eines kompletten Frühstücks.

content.en: Every once in a while, I like to indulge in a little bit of _______.
Have a bad cold? For a quick and easy remedy, try ________!
Nothing is more disappointing than expecting _______, but receiving _______.
content.de: Nichts ist enttäuschender, als wenn man ________ erwartet, jedoch ________ bekommt.

content.en: What never fails to ruin the party?
content.de: Was wird die Party immer ruinieren?

content.en: McDonald's received widespread backlash for its controversial TV ad featuring _______.
What did I find in my soup?
content.de: Was habe ich in meiner Suppe entdeckt?

content.en: What did Santa leave in my stocking this year?
content.de: Was hat der Weihnachtsmann dieses Jahr in meinem Strumpf gelassen?

content.en: What can money never buy?
There's ________ in my boot!
It's crazy what you can buy online these days! Did you know Amazon sells ________ now?
Doctors were shocked to find ______ on the patient's abdominal x-ray.
Recent studies have revealed a strong link between ________ and ________.
According to popular superstition, seeing _______ is considered a bad omen.
Our bank boasts a state-of-the-art security system– one of the first in the world to use _______ to keep your money safe.
Proposals these days are crazy. I know someone who hid their engagement ring inside ________!
Reaching over 2,000,000 Scoville units, the Carolina _______ holds the Guiness World Record for the hottest chili pepper.
The gravitational pull from _______ is so strong, not even light can escape.
content.de: Die Anziehungskraft von ________ ist so stark, dass nicht einmal Licht entweichen kann.

content.en:
My bucket list:
- Travel the world.
- Go skydiving.
- ________.
content.de:
Meine Löffelliste:
- Die Welt bereisen.
- Fallschirmspringen gehen.
- ________.

content.en: Now that I've graduated from art school, I can finally be ________!
content.de: Jetzt, da ich die Kunstschule abgeschlossen habe, kann ich endlich ________ sein!

content.en: Any man can be a father, but it takes someone special to be ________.
content.de: Jeder Mann kann ein Vater sein, aber es braucht jemanden Besonderen, um ________ zu sein.

content.en: Five years from now, a new law will be passed that bans _________.
content.de: In fünf Jahren wird ein neues Gesetz verabschiedet werden, das ________ verbietet.
